data.name: jaspAudit
data.description: The Audit module is developed to facilitate statistical auditing in both Bayesian and classical manifestations. The main feature is a workflow that helps guide auditors through the sampling process. Additionally, there are stand-alone analyses for planning, selecting, and evaluating a sample. The module is based on the R package jfa.

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "In order to familiarize oneself with the Audit module, it is recommended to obtain and read the manual via this [download link](https://koenderks.github.io/jaum/JASP-for-Audit.pdf), or to view it onli"
“JASP for Audit (also known as the Audit module) is an add-on module for JASP that streamlines the process of statistical auditing.”
“The Audit Module is a graphical user interface that has been constructed to integrate with the jfa R package… which offers a comprehensive set of statistical methods for auditing.”
